channel.title: Posts on Cupertino Choraliers

item.title: Summer Schedule
item.description: Hi Choraliers, Below are the venues and times of our performances. The time given is performance time so plan to arrive the usual 15 minutes or more ahead of time: July 8 at 10:30 Cedar Crest Nursing and Rehabilitation 197 E Fremont Ave Sunnyvale, CA 94087 Map July 15 at 10:00 Grace Adult Day Health Care 3010 Olcott St Santa Clara, CA 95054 Map July 22 at 10:30
